website_summaries.verdict: Any slime-obsessed kid will love this fluffy slime advent calendar that includes slimes and accessories.
pros: Includes 12 different scented fluffy slimes and 22 add-ins including foam beads, glitter, and charms
Each slime comes in a different pastel color
The slime is soft and easy to play with
cons: The containers the slime come in aren't airtight, so they will dry out if they aren't stored in a different container

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Its sturdy and colorful. It have a good quality slimes on inside. My kids opens it one a new window every day it's like a journey!
customer_reviews.author: Labevy

customer_reviews.title: More fun than a traditional advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old loves this calendar. Our Elf on the Shelf brought it with her from the North Pole just in time for the first door to be opened on December 1st. My daughter likes it so much that she keeps it next to her bed and opens a door as soon as she awakes. The calendar has a nice balance of slime containers and add-ins. The only downside, in my daughter's opinion, is that over time the slime stiffens up a bit. It's still good to play with, though. I don't mind at all, since she still gets to enjoy it for a week or two, and I don't want it hanging around the house forever anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mareleopard

customer_reviews.title: Unique advent idea
customer_reviews.text: I get advent calendars for my kids each year and it is harder now that I have a 12 year old . She was never into the slime craze but still enjoyed it on occasion. I took a chance on this one and she has really enjoyed it (granted we are only on day 4, but it has been fun for her). The description says they are scented but we haven't noticed a scent. The mix ins are fun, and it has some fun colors. This is a fun option!
customer_reviews.author: momtimes3

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 yr old daughter. The little charms that come with this make it worth the money paid. The slime was good, but it does dry out within a few days after opening. It's still worth the purchase, it kept my daughter busy, gave her something that she likes for her advent calendar, and we used the charms and other added extras with our other slime kits. The containers that the slime comes in with this kit, are good to use with other slime kits. We use them to store her slime that came with other kits and toys. So this was a good addition to my daughter's slime 'collection'. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Hallo

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I really enjoyed having something different for Advent and for all 24 days, not just 12. We were a little disappointed that there were so many slimes in the same or similar colors. It would be nice if each slime was unique. Also, it would have been nice if the kit came with other items like a scent instead of a bunch of glitter. It would have made the kit more exciting to have more of a variety of items.
customer_reviews.author: Product tester

customer_reviews.title: It drys quicker than you think
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like it the slime feels like it’s just clay and lotion which is not exactly a fluffy slime it was actually pretty nice texture but I don’t think you put that much effort into it if you just put clay and some lotion or shaving cream that’s not a fluffy slime and I don’t think if you put snow into it it’s not gonna become a cloud slime or cloud cream or any other kind of slime basically and it was a little bit greasy and the swan dry pretty quick and I just didn’t get a good review so that she does my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: super fun! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Okay the charms are nice. The mix in's you can't see because they get lost in the solid color slime. But the little jars are super cute and my kids save them for the clear slime they have. My 10 year old adds lotion to the slime and it makes it perfect. Otherwise it dries out fast. They have had a blast with this calendar so far.
customer_reviews.author: fairytoes

customer_reviews.title: Box was crushed! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great idea. I have a daughter that loves to make slime. Unfortunately the advent calendar box was crushed, the top left side and “day 2” slot was torn open. Again great idea but now I feel like I’m giving my child a damaged gift.
customer_reviews.author: kathi farrelly

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, not great packaging....
customer_reviews.text: We love the concept, as does my 8 year old. However, the perforated rings for the daily surprises dont hold up at all to daily children handling. Many future days have come partially disconnected, and we have taped them closed until it's time to open. Of they could improve this one flaw, itd be an amazing product. The slime is great, accessories are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dashnau

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Nice and colorful with big numbers which makes it easier for little kids to handle. My daughter loves the items inside, so much so it has been difficult to keep her from opening more than one a day. Wish they had one for boys too! Will keep an eye out for this next year.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Good slime - needs some work for price
customer_reviews.text: So far this was a hit! The box was colorful and looked fun and the slime was fresh and fluffy. Ok- we have opened most of the boxes and here’s the full review: Good: slimes are good Love the little charms and bottles of add ins- Bad: slimes are all the same consistency and we received the same color multiple times Paper container it came in was flimsy and thin - and you could easily see what was in the other days beside it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for slime lovers
customer_reviews.text: My slime loving kid has really enjoyed this advent calendar. She looks forward to opening every day. Her only complaint was at first every slime was pink in color, but then she started getting some other colors and lightened up, ha. Some of the add-ins have been really cute and I love how the slime comes in a resealable container. As a parent I'm very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be played with a little bit before it gets to the perfect consistency
customer_reviews.text: This is a review from my 10-year-old daughter who I bought this for. 1. When first taken out it’s watery and sticky but after you play with it it gets nice and soft. 2. Kid recommended 3.fun advent calendar 4. Fun and glitter and bead add ins, Fun fun colors
customer_reviews.author: amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Thought she would love it! I was mistaken.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old slime loving daughter was excited about this calendar- at first. The texture of the slimes wasn’t her favorite. Also, the additional sprinkles and glitters to add should be alternating with the slimes. Overall it’s a cool concept but I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Great gift... one flaw
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been thrilled to open this each day. The slime is good quality. She has opened little vials with glitter and beads. There are also decorations like a unicorn, snowflakes, candy pieces. The only complaint was that the compartment under day 19 was completely empty. So we had lots of tears that morning because she thought that meant she was bad :( But overall it’s a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I love my daughter's father. I love more that my daughter loved this advent calendar at his house, and not mine. My kiddo LOVED this calendar. I am thrilled the glitter and beads and allll the other additions to the numerous slimes ended up all over his house. My kiddo loved this advent calendar and I loved that she glitter bombed his house instead of him. He he he he.
customer_reviews.author: Marian F. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is LOVING her slime Advent Calendar this year
customer_reviews.text: She is so excited each morning to see if she is going to get more slime or and add-in. We haven't opened them all but so far so good! The quality of the fluffy slime has been good. We started with 24 and are counting down to 1. I'm not sure which is the right way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this early thinking it would be a big seller for Christmas. Looked fine as I opened it. Nothing flashy but comes with a lot of slime slots which is nice. Now that we are opening them I wanted to to a review. Some slots are missing pieces! My kids are super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: TML

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m crazy, but I got this for my kid for Christmas. It has tons of slimes in it and the mix-ins, too, such as glitter and tiny unicorns, etc. She loved it. Well packaged and good quality. If you don’t like glitter and tiny doo-dads, you might want to skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Aren

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old as she is a slime fanatic. However, buyer beware... there’s definitely some false advertising, it shows a big glitter container in their pictures and what you actually get is less than a teaspoon. The calendar comes with most the days half way popped open so that’s disappointing, stuffs just falling out. This could be a good product and my daughter has liked it but it’s not worth the money at this point. Hopefully they’ll improve on some things and not post false advertising. I shared a picture of what they claim the glitter is vs what actually comes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my slime obsessed kid
customer_reviews.text: My slime obsessed daughter has been absolutely thrilled that she has a slime advent calendar. I always do toys and not food and this was the first time that I have seen anything like this. I was so excited but I don't know if I will be able to beat this next year. Thanks for setting the bar higher!
customer_reviews.author: TNWorkNMom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. The only thing that stinks is all the little mixture pieces that go with the slime. Probably because I have kids and they tend to make messes! Lol but it's a good advent calendar for those looking for a slime one. The color of slime is doubled on them
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I had an angry toddler when I had to take away the small glitter & sparkle mix-in jars every time he got them. He did really like the little charms but I wasn’t all that impressed with them. I won’t be buying this next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this idea! For the parents who want another option besides just sugar, and slime is so hot right now. My daughter who is 7 loved it. We loved the unique charm surprises included, and I've really never seen them before! Excellent quality. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome for kids who like slime and goodies to add into it
customer_reviews.text: Bought one each for my 8 and 10 year olds. They’re loving opening a section each morning. Sometimes it’s a container of cloud-like slime/putty, other times it’s stuff to mix into the slime like foam balls. Sometimes there are little trinkets to put in the slime too, like mini lollipops. Very cute product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Vennum

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: This slime advent calendar has been a huge hit! I love that the slime comes in a container to keep it from drying out and I love that the slime is fluffy instead of sticky. My daughter loves seeing what surprise each day brings. It’s a small container so may not be appreciated by older kids.
customer_reviews.author: pamela r ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Activate and enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar was a fantastic purchase! At first I was bummed because the first slime was not slime consistency, but my daughter figured out why. When you open the slime you need to mix in the liquidy activator that's in the bottom of the container. Easy! My daughter (13 yrs old) really enjoyed opening up a new surprise each day. The slime add-ins are really fun and cute. I think slime lovers of any age will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Drakeford

customer_reviews.title: great product quality 11 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this advent calendar! The slime is quality, the decorations are quality the little containers are quality, the packaging is quality (foam rubber to hold the tubs in place). My 11 year old loves this! highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: KindleCustomer451

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Super nice, great trinkets. Daughter loves this. Second purchase / she had the same one last year and asked for it again. Some new toys were in this years.
customer_reviews.author: Xanthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for alone lovers
customer_reviews.text: Just opened day 1 so far so good. The 4 stars are due to The #7 spot being opened upon arrival with nothing in the spot. We will see how the rest go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: There were multiple mini containers of slime in different colors. It also had things like glitter or small plastic shapes to add to the slime. My 13-year-old has fun opening the doors everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxstarr

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far, 10 days, and very pleased with variety and quality of slimes and add-ons. My 10 year old is happy to see what each window brings.
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: Good product, mangled box.
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what my child wanted, but the box was really beat up and some of the days were already popped open, things were falling out and others could be seen. I’m not sure why there was such a mangled box because it was also inside a larger amazon box. I was disappointed for my child that part of the surprise was ruined. Otherwise, the products inside the box are satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love slime, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The numbers were falling off ahead of time, making it less fun formy daughters. Also, the slime jars are very small. It's a fun slime advent calendar over all, though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fluffy slime I’ve seen!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this one, but oh wow was I surprised. The slime is some of the best quality fluffy slime I have seen. Absolutely worth the money. I will definitely be reordering next Christmas. My 8 year old daughter is just as impressed. You get 12 days of slime and then 12 days of neat ingredients to put in the slime- like sparkles, mini balls, etc. So pleasantly surprised with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tramell

customer_reviews.title: Daugther was happy
customer_reviews.text: Daugther loved it for the Christmas time A bit expensive for the money but absolutely worth the smile on her Face! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Luiggi

customer_reviews.title: THIS SLIME IS SUBLIME..LOL!
customer_reviews.text: MY 9 YEAR OLD LOVES THIS SLIME.. EVERY DAY SHE OPENS UP SOMETHING NEW... GOOD QUALITY AND THE GLITTER, AND FOAM BEADS ARE A BONUS THAT YOU ADD TO THE SLIME. GOOD PRODUCT.. FOR THE PRICE, DEFINITELY WORTH IT. NOT TO MENTION YOU EVEN GET LITTLE TRINKETS ON A COUPLE OF DAYS.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Missing items in the days but overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's been great. Very different than what we usually get but that's what we wanted. Except when my daughter opens a spot and its empty. That was not ok. Disappointed in that 14 days in. Fingers crossed the rest have items in it.
customer_reviews.author: AllThatShines

customer_reviews.title: Great value great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We do an advent calendar for our daughter every year, as she is now a tween it It’s getting harder to find A Calendar that is inexpensive but contains items of interest, this fit the bill perfectly! Each morning she was excited about opening a new day on the calendar! It contains The same amount of slime and interesting ad in s as any other set and truly is a value for the price! If your child likes slime this is the early gift to get!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kurzawa

customer_reviews.title: Great slime advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: This slime advent calendar was perfect! I came with tons of slime and mix-ins. Hours and hours of daily entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the slime enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: My youngest went nuts for this calendar. It’s a great mix of slime related items with a few containers of slime, some charm, and some mix ins. If you have a slime lover, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: SillyRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Cute calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves slime and loved the calendar. My only complaint is that the little vials of glitter are hard to open. 2 cracked and the contents spilled everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Txmama

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love more slime in the house
customer_reviews.text: My oldest is a slime fanatic. Now we have a lot more slime. It seems to be pretty good quality and not sticky/messy.
customer_reviews.author: CBRadio

customer_reviews.title: Great for little girls
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughters to count off until Christmas. They both enjoyed having slime to open up each day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Really good fluffy slime
customer_reviews.text: The slime was surprisingly good and my daughter loved the tiny bottles of glitter and charms that you can add to the slime. Would get again!
customer_reviews.author: Max Vokral

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these for Christmas. It comes with slime and little accessories to use with/in the slime. It's not too sticky and doesn't have a chemical smell. So much better than the little Advent chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this advent calendar. The smile is so fluffy and the best part is it will not destroy anything.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift from our elf but came with one of the days already punched out and missing. Charms kept falling into other days leaving empty days. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sofar!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality of this slime but it’s actually great—not the sticky, messy kind. My 8 year old loves opening the little doors to reveal slime or mixing agents. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Our Child Loves This
customer_reviews.text: While you are likely paying a little too much for what you get (in my opinion), our daughter loves this advent calendar. If your child loves slime, then I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The best slime ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best advent slime calendar. My daughter is a slime fanatic and she is in love with the little surprises and the slime. We love the packages the slime is in and she loves the texture. It’s real butter slime. This is one thing I actually purchased full price this season and I am not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Charise

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved this. Will buy again. So fun and it got her out of bed in the morning for school cause she wanted to open it
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved it! Her friend loved it so much that I bought her one for a Christmas present! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love slime!
customer_reviews.text: A fun twist on the advent calendar! My daughter loves slime and has fun playing with all the slime goodies she gets. If you are tired of the usual candy advent calendars, give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Bmenasce

customer_reviews.title: Favorite advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her advent calendar! It’s her favorite one she’s ever had. The slimes are fluffy and the accessories blend well into them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Harpers

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Some of the slime is VERY sticky and gets all over the place. It's okay for the price. My daughter is still enjoying opening one each day.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Denise

customer_reviews.title: A MUST buy for any little girl that loves slime
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this advent calendar!!!! If you have a child that LOVES slime this gift is perfect for them!!!!! Slime is very nice.... little trinkets and glitter and foam beads are great accessories to combine to the slimes. A must BUY for slime lovers!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!!
customer_reviews.text: We are 7 days into this advent calendar and my 10 year old loves it!! I was a little nervous because she is so picky about her slimes. Fluffy slime and fun add ins.
customer_reviews.author: Presssmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar for a 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loved waking up every morning to a new gift. Traditions have begun!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fun everyday
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was more excited about this fun Advent calendar then most other things this past holiday season! Everyday there was an incredible surprise of fun slime and slime accessories as well! Perfect gift for most children who love crafts and slime!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Rosa Onori

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar! Many different slimes and add-one: styrofoam balls, glitter, etc. perfect advent calendar for little ones that don’t need more candy!
customer_reviews.author: courtchurch

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for an advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Although we have not started opening them yet, I think there are good size. The kids have seen the boxes and they're super excited.
customer_reviews.author: Evalynn4158

customer_reviews.title: Quality slime- daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves slime. This was a great way to get a surprise each day.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is super into slime, and this did not disappoint. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift on Thanksgiving to keep the fun going till Christmas. 8 year old girl loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Could use more variety but overall I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: claudine caracciolo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to have this advent calendar. We are on day 2 and the slime etc are all great quality. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MomConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Some days come empty
customer_reviews.text: Two of the days were EMPTY!!!! My daughter cried thinking Santa ir her elf were punishing her. Do not buy if you actually want your child to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I Grandchildren absolutely love this, I will definitely looking for one similar next year. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SHALIMAR

customer_reviews.title: My daughter daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Nice arrangement of things that come with this. My daughter enjoyed it and for the price it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: This was so fun and different!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this advent calendar so much we bought another one. Can't wait to see if they do another theme for this year but if not, we will purchase again for sure. The slime and the charms and adds in are absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Great fluffy slime advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old daughter who’s obsessed with slime LOVED this advent calendar. I had other advent calendars for my two youngest kids and when I saw this for my oldest I knew this was perfect for her. The quality so far seems great. She loves the fluffy slime and all the accessories it has come with so far. The advent box itself seems to be holding up so far too. Would order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Lano

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived well, no damage. Aside from getting 2 identical yellow slimes in a row, we absolutely love this calendar. We are currently on day 9. I feel it’s a great value for the money and my 14 year old can’t wait to open it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carriere

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, opened the first 3 boxes already and no slime 😭. The bigger box was empty, no container or anything. Daughter was so upset.
customer_reviews.author: codie

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great and different Advent Calendar- fun even for my 15 year old! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Libinatorsmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: Fun advent calendar. It includes 12 days of slime & 12 days of items to mix in the slime. When I saw it arrive I wasn’t sure it would hold interest for a month. But they did a nice job of including a mix of glitters & trinkets. My 5yo daughter has loved it. We’re on day 16.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee a.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved this. It had a lot of good prizes. Great value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: MOM2SIX

customer_reviews.title: Ok if your child likes slime,  this is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo has more fun with this than any advent ever. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was much better quality than expected. The slime is great and the contents didn't shift during shipping or anything.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect advent calendar if your child is really into slime! I try to pick a new one every year (legos one year, crayoloa one year, etc) and this one is a hit so far!
customer_reviews.author: Katie U.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but needs new colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors were all the same 2 of each and my Daughter was disappointed about the repeats
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves slime, and this was the perfect Advent Calendar for her! Fun add ins and lots of slime in their own little containers!
customer_reviews.author: Angie O

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent for the slime lover
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the Advent calendars my daughter has had over the years this is her absolute favorite. The slime is vibrant and fluffy, not sticky and messy. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors Repeat
customer_reviews.text: The slime and accessories are fun and exciting to open each day. The downfall is that as the 10th spot there has been repeats of colors. Hopefully we will have more variety in the unopened spots. Some of the slime has dried up some but it has been played with quite a bit so that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas time and loved opening a new day. She loved the slime the different things to put in slime. There was a great variety too
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Jarvio

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! Well worth the money for my grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: jillly

customer_reviews.title: Good gif5
customer_reviews.text: It was a little pricey for slime and so far we've had 3 pink slimes out of the 5 we opened. Otherwise my child loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been perfect if it wasn’t missing items
customer_reviews.text: Great advent Calendar for kids who love slime. 2 stars because 3 slots were completely empty.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this slime advent calendar! My son said it was well worth what I spent on it, which was not much! Price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen McKee

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loved this - she opened it for her birthday and her friends went crazy! We ended up buying another one for the next birthday party she was invited to since it was so popular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for slime lovers.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect my daughter loved it. Just wish the slime came in more colors instead of repeating the same colors.
customer_reviews.author: juan restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Let the countdown begin
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 yo daughter & what a hit! She’s excited every morning to open another compartment. Great buy for any slime lover.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute if slime is your thing.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nine year old daughter and she loved it but was disappointed that on day twenty there was nothing there. Other than that it was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels75

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever! My daughter loves slime! This comes with soo many cute add ins and charms!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this advent calendar. The slime is ‘fluffy slime’ so it’s not as messy as regular slime. The mix ins are fun and bright colored.
customer_reviews.author: SJK

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had so much fun opening this advent calendar this yr. the items inside are perfect. The slime is a fluffy feel not gooey, so very well made. So cute & my child loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matushin

customer_reviews.title: Fun slume
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. She is 8 years old, I would highly recommend this advent calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple days with no surprise
customer_reviews.text: This item would have been great except at least eight of the days had nothing in them. Disappointed with that, otherwise it would have been a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Advent
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids make this a nighly event and facetime me to show me what they have gotten. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon BARNETT

customer_reviews.title: Bad slime
customer_reviews.text: We are on day 8 and most of the slime they give you is bad .. do not waste your money on this .. such a cute thing but waste of money since most slimes are runny and bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ORIENTAL CHERRY Advent Calendar 2019 - DIY Fluffy Slime Kit - Countdown to for Kids Girls Teens 4 5 6 7 8 9 Year Old
feature_bullets: COUNTDOWN TO SANTA - Make this a magical Christmas for any girl with the 2019 Fluffy Slime Advent Calendar.
30+ SURPRISES TO DISCOVER - Includes 12 scented fluffy slime and 22 accessories (Foam beads, glitter, charms)
ENDLESS COMBINATIONS - Your slime lover can make all the popular slimes - foam, cloud, jellycube, fishbowl - and also dream up something all her own using our marvelous mix-ins.
STRESS RELIEF GIFT - Stretch the slime, squeeze it, poke, squish, swirl, let it drip or ooze - so satisfying! Have a great parent-child time during holidays.
Check our store MORDUN for more Holiday decorations & Gifts!
